meanings.definition: To make greater in power, influence, or reputation.
meanings.sent1: She was aggrandizing her role by taking on more responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The company's marketing campaign aimed at aggrandizing its brand image.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was aggrandizing her toy collection by adding more dolls.
meanings.sent4: His ambitious plans were aggrandizing his dreams to reach new heights.
meanings.sent5: The artist's use of vibrant colors aggrandized the beauty of the painting.

meanings.definition: To enhance the power, wealth, position, or reputation of.
meanings.sent1: The generous donation aggrandized the charity's ability to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The successful business deal aggrandized his financial status.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient aggrandized the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her eloquent speech aggrandized her standing in the community.
meanings.sent5: The new title aggrandized his importance within the organization.
